Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、クレア……ガジュマの身体って どんな感じなの？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, Claire... What is the body of a Gajuma like?

Entry.JapaneseText: うーん……とっても身軽な感じかな。 それに、とても快適。
Entry.EnglishText: Well... It feels very nimble. And also rather comfortable.
Comfortable? What do you mean by that?

Entry.JapaneseText: 毛皮のせいか、暑い時も、寒い時も、 いつもちょうどいい感じになるの。
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps it's because of the fur, but I always feel just right even when it's hot or cold.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、においとか味とか、感触とか、 そういうのはヒューマと同じみたい。
Entry.EnglishText: But when it comes to smell, or taste, or sensation, those all seem to be the same as a Huma's.
